entry.title: Thorinox - ALL Stainless Steel Work Table with Undershelf & Backsplash - 30" Deep
entry.summary:
Vendor: Thorinox
Type: Stainless Steel Work Table
Price: 327.00 - 765.00 (8 variants)

This Thorinox table has a top that is 18 gauge 430 stainless steel, and a 5" backsplash. The undershelf and legs are stainless steel as-well. It is 30" deep and comes in a variety of widths ranging from 24" - 96".

The tables from 24" - 72" have four legs. The 84" and 96" tables have six.

      • Made with high quality 18 gauge 430 stainless steel
      • Easy to assemble
      • 5" backsplash

entry.title: EFI - Stainless Steel Work Table with Open Base - 30" Deep
entry.summary:
Vendor: EFI
Type: Stainless Steel Work Table
Price: 195.00 - 363.00 (6 variants)

The EFI stainless steel work tables with open bases come in a variety of sizes. This line is 30" deep (from front to back) and its width (from left to right) can be as small as 36" wide to as big as 96" wide. The top is a heavy duty, 18 gauge, type 430 stainless steel, and the rest is galvanized metal.

These tables have been constructed to exceed industry standards. The top has been machine polished to a satin finish, and the galvanized hat channels have been secured to the top with a structural adhesive and welded studs. And the gussets are welded to support the hat section.If you're not an engineer, what this means is this: the table is sturdy. So you should be able to use this table for many years to come in any commercial kitchen.

The table comes unassembled, which will vastly reduce the shipping size and cost. And it comes with adjustable ABS bullet feet, which will allow you to level out the table on uneven flooring.

      • Heavy duty, 18 gauge, Type 430 Stainless Steel top
      • Entire top surface machine polished to satin finish
      • Reinforced to exceed industry standards
      • Hemmed edges provide strength and safety
      • Die cast reinforced leg sockets for stability
      • Legs are 1.625" diameter

      SPECS

      Item Number Dimensions (WDH) Load Capacity Drawing
      TLB3036 36" x 30" x 35" 700 lb* PDF
      TLB3048 48" x 30" x 35" 800 lb* PDF
      TLB3060 60" x 30" x 35" 900 lb* PDF
      TLB3072 72" x 30" x 35" 900 lb* PDF
      TLB3084 84" x 30" x 35" 1100 lb* PDF
      TLB3096 96" x 30" x 35" 1100 lb* PDF

      *Please note: the manufacturer has not provided load capacities for these models. We believe these estimates are fairly accurate, but they are still only approximations, so please use your own discretion.

      WARRANTY

      All EFI products are warranted against manufacturing defects for a period of one year from the date of your original purchase date. EFI Sales Ltd may repair or replace defective units at its discretion.

      DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: EFI - ALL Stainless Steel Work Table with Undershelf - 24" Deep
entry.summary:
Vendor: EFI
Type: Stainless Steel Work Table
Price: 454.00 - 934.00 (6 variants)

EFI has a full line of all stainless steel work tables that are 24" deep. You can get one from 36" wide to as big as 96" wide. They have been constructed entirely out of stainless steel.

The undershelves on these tables go to the edge of the legs, so you're going to be getting a full-sized undershelf, and the legs have been secured with a double-set screw, to ensure a rigid, solid structure. And the edges have been hemmed to provide strength and safety. All in all, you'll be getting a high-quality, sturdy table.

      • Heavy duty, 18 gauge, Type 304 Stainless Steel top
      • Heavy duty Type 430 Stainless Steel legs and under-shelves
      • Entire top surface machine polished to satin finish
      • Reinforced to exceed industry standards
      • Hemmed edges provide strength and safety
      • Die cast reinforced leg sockets for stability

    SPECS

    Item Number Dimensions (WDH) Drawing
    TS2436 36" x 24" x 35" PDF
    TS2448 48" x 24" x 35" PDF
    TS2460 60" x 24" x 35" PDF

    TS2484 84" x 24" x 35" PDF
    TS2496 96" x 24" x 35" PDF

entry.title: Omcan - ALL Stainless Steel Work Table with Undershelf - 30" Deep
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omcan
Type: Stainless Steel Work Table
Price: 297.00 - 644.00 (7 variants)

This work table from Omcan has been made entirely out of stainless steel (as opposed to other models, which would be made of stainless steel on top, but with galvanized metal elsewhere). This is necessary for certain establishments for health code reasons, but others may want to go with an all stainless steel table for other reasons. 

Its made entirely out of top quality 20 gauge 430 stainless steel, and it has a depth of 30", with a variety of widths: 30", 36", 48", 60", 72", 84", and 96".

From 30" - 72" wide, the tables have four legs. The 84" and 96" models have six legs.

      • Made entirely out of 20-Gauge 430 stainless steel
      • NSF approved
      • Comes with stainless steel legs with Stainless Steel Bullet Feet for Worktables
      • 34 inches high

SPECS

Item Number Dimensions (DWH) Load Capacity Packaged Weight
19142 30" x 30" x 34" 800 lb 46

19147 30" x 96" x 34" 1700 lb 228*

*includes the weight of the pallet.

WARRANTY

180 day warranty.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Omcan
Type: Stainless Steel Work Table
Price: 197.00 - 462.00 (7 variants)

This Omcan work table's top and 4" backsplash is 18 Gauge 430 Stainless Steel. The undershelf and legs are galvanized. It is 30" deep and comes in a variety of widths: 30", 36", 48", 60", 72", 84", 96".

From 30" - 72", the tables have four legs. The 84" and 96" models have six legs.

entry.title: Omcan - Stainless Steel Work Table with Undershelf - 24" Deep
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omcan
Type: Stainless Steel Work Table
Price: 132.00 - 360.00 (10 variants)

The top of this table is made of 18 Gauge 430 stainless steel. The legs and undershelf are galvanized. This model is 24" from front to back and comes in a variety of widths, from 18" to 96". From 18" - 72" wide, the tables have four legs. The 84" and 96" models have six legs.

Please note: one model is 24" deep and 18" wide and another is 18" deep and 24" inches wide. There is actually a difference between the two. The model that is 24" deep and 18" wide (item number 43182) is meant to be a filler table between equipment.

      • Support Channels secured via bolt and acorn style nut
      • The Galvanized Under-shelf designed with welded V pipe leg supports
      • Legs secured by single set-screw design
      • Plastic Bullet Feet
      • NSF approved
